title: Virtual Patient Simulation-Enhanced Medical History-Taking Competency Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and patient interview procedures
context.additional_context: Educational environment where students access a virtual patient simulation platform via personal devices, engage in self-directed learning, and gain experiences similar to real clinical settings.

learning_goals: Learners can perform core history-taking skills with over 80% accuracy through interactions with virtual patients across diverse fields
Learners achieve a score improvement of over 70% based on standard OSCE evaluation criteria in medical/surgical domains
Learners report confidence levels of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in applying skills acquired in simulation environments to real clinical situations

resources: Virtual patient simulation platform (similar to Klark-cases.com)
Mobile devices and internet access environment

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
